.@DenholmeUnited: â€œNo #DeadlineDay deals at DUFC today. Plenty of players fishing for a move to Foster Park but unless your first name is Lionel (preferably Richie, but we'd take Messi), we're not interested...â€ #UpTheStags

.@SuleyOzturk: â€œ...Steven Berghuis or Nasser El Khayati. The statement, however, is not correct. We've become so accustomed to Messi's appearance that in his case we have consciously and unconsciously adjusted the standard.â€ (2/2) https://t.co/BJB0j0QeXd

.@SuleyOzturk: â€œLionel Messi is often quoted on Dutch talk shows, when an Eredivisie player shows something special you often hear; â€˜If Messi does this, we'd hear about it for weeksâ€™. It's a note intended to emphasize how special a particular action is from, for example... (1/2)

.@SuleyOzturk: â€œThe goals & assists are the exclamation marks after 90 minutes. They're repeated, collected and put one after another. Yet he is much more than a collection of stats & records. So much happens between the exclamation marks, that what he does is so hard to grasp!â€ https://t.co/Ue0U1vL4U5

.@SuleyOzturk: â€œIt may sound a little strange, but Lionel Messi has ruined watching Lionel Messi. We would probably be blown out of our seat every time there was a possibility to erase the memory when it comes to Messi...and to re-live the moment with each game.â€ https://t.co/MU8S0RgnCh
